name: Tenfold.
description:
Empty the grid by pairing up numbers in this minimal take on the classic paper-and-pen game. Whether you're in it to win or just need to let your mind wander, Tenfold is the perfect pastime.

Tenfold features:
- Thoughtful and focused sudoku-like gameplay
- Endless challenges from a single starting point of the same 27 numbers
- No game over – keep going for as many rounds as you need to pair up everything
- A simple, no-frills design
- A dose of nostalgia for those who remember the game from their school years
